mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, eno, ename, position, workday, startTime, finishTime, overTime from (select e.eno, e.ename, e.position, a.workday, a.startTime, a.finishTime, a.overTime from att a, emp e where e.eno = a.eno order by a.workDay desc, a.starttime asc) where rownum <= (#{cri.pageNum}*#{cri.amount}) and eno = #{eno}) where rn > ((#{cri.pageNum}-1)*#{cri.amount})
select * from att where eno = #{eno} and workDay = #{workDay}
mapper.insert: insert into att(eno, dno, workday, startTime, finishTime, overTime) values(#{eno}, #{dno}, #{workDay}, #{startTime}, #{finishTime}, #{overTime})
mapper.select: select count(*) from att where eno = #{eno}
